transfer.description: Transfers `value` amount of tokens to the `to` address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `value` amount of tokens from `from` address to `to` address using allowance.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of the `owner` address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend from `owner`.

approve.description: Sets `value` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is paused.

renouncePauser.description: Renounces the pauser role of the caller.

PauserAdded.description: Emitted when a new pauser is added.

PauserRemoved.description: Emitted when a pauser is removed.

Paused.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Unpaused.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.

Approval.description: Emitted when an allowance is set or increased.
